IL_Add().description: Adds an icon or picture to the specified ImageListID and returns the new icon's index (1 is the first icon, 2 is the second, and so on).

IL_Create().description: Creates a new ImageList, initially empty, and returns the unique ID of the ImageList (or 0 upon failure).

IL_Destroy().description: Deletes the specified ImageList and returns 1 upon success and 0 upon failure.
